attributes.action: ban people from taking dogs to schools when collecting children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day when I fetch my children from nursery and first school there always seems to be at least half a dozen dogs at the school.  Sometimes they are not even on leads because their owners feel the 'dog is good with children'!  How often have we heard that after a child has been attacked!  There is also the problem of fouling around the school.  Dogs can be walked at other times and places that are not a danger to children!
